mapper.sql: ITM_ID, PARENT_ITM_ID, LEVEL, SYS_ID, ITM_TYP, IS_LEAF, ITM_NAME, ITM_DESC, ITM_URL, IS_USE, ICON, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM

ITM_ID as 'key',ITM_ID as itmId, PARENT_ITM_ID as parentItmId, LEVEL as level, SYS_ID as sysId, ITM_TYP as itmTyp,IS_LEAF as isLeaf, ITM_NAME as itmName, ITM_DESC as itmDesc, ITM_URL as itmUrl, IS_USE as isUse, ICON as icon, CRE_OBJ as creObj, CRE_TIM as creTim, UPD_OBJ as updObj, UPD_TIM as updTim
mapper.update: update AUTH_ITEM set IS_LEAF=#{1} where ITM_ID=#{0}
mapper.select: select from AUTH_ITEM where PARENT_ITM_ID=#{parentItmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ITM_ID DESC limit 1
mapper.update: update AUTH_ITEM set IS_USE=#{0},UPD_OBJ=#{2},UPD_TIM=#{3} where ITM_ID=#{1}
mapper.select: select i.ITM_ID as itmId, i.PARENT_ITM_ID as parentItmId,i.LEVEL as level, i.SYS_ID as sysId,si.SYS_NAME as sysName,i.ITM_TYP as itmTyp, i.IS_LEAF as isLeaf,i.ITM_NAME as itmName, i.ITM_DESC as itmDesc, i.ITM_URL as itmUrl, i.IS_USE as isUse, i.ICON as icon, i.CRE_OBJ as creObj,i.CRE_TIM as creTim, i.UPD_OBJ as updObj, i.UPD_TIM as updTim from AUTH_ITEM i left join AUTH_SYS_INF si on i.SYS_ID=si.SYS_ID where i.ITM_ID = #{itmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into AUTH_ITEM (ITM_ID, PARENT_ITM_ID, LEVEL, SYS_ID, ITM_TYP, IS_LEAF, ITM_NAME, ITM_DESC, ITM_URL, IS_USE, ICON, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM) values (#{itmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentItmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itmTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{itmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUse,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creTim,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update AUTH_ITEM
PARENT_ITM_ID = #{parentItmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR},
SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITM_TYP = #{itmTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=CHAR},
ITM_NAME = #{itmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITM_DESC = #{itmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITM_URL = #{itmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=CHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRE_OBJ = #{creObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRE_TIM = #{creTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPD_OBJ = #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_TIM = #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ITM_ID = #{itmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update AUTH_ITEM set PARENT_ITM_ID = #{parentItmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITM_TYP = #{itmTyp,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_LEAF = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=CHAR}, ITM_NAME = #{itmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITM_DESC = #{itmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITM_URL = #{itmUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_USE = #{isUse,jdbcType=CHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_OBJ = #{creObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRE_TIM = #{creTim,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPD_OBJ = #{updObj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_TIM = #{updTim,jdbcType=CHAR} where ITM_ID = #{itmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

otherwise.if: select * from (select a.*, rownum rn from (

mapper.select: select ITM_ID, PARENT_ITM_ID, LEVEL, SYS_ID, ITM_TYP, IS_LEAF, ITM_NAME, ITM_DESC, ITM_URL, IS_USE, ICON, CRE_OBJ, CRE_TIM, UPD_OBJ, UPD_TIM from AUTH_ITEM

select i.ITM_ID as 'key',i.ITM_ID as itmId, i.PARENT_ITM_ID as parentItmId, i.LEVEL as level, i.SYS_ID as sysId, si.SYS_NAME as sysName,i.ITM_TYP as itmTyp, i.IS_LEAF as isLeaf, i.ITM_NAME as itmName, i.ITM_DESC as itmDesc, i.ITM_URL as itmUrl,i.IS_USE as isUse, i.ICON as icon, i.CRE_OBJ as creObj, i.CRE_TIM as creTim, i.UPD_OBJ as updObj, i.UPD_TIM as updTim from AUTH_ITEM i left join AUTH_SYS_INF si on i.SYS_ID = si.SYS_ID
and length(trim(i.ITM_ID))=3
and i.ITM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{itmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and i.SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(ITM_ID) from AUTH_ITEM
and length(trim(ITM_ID))>3
and length(trim(ITM_ID))>3
and SYS_ID = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
